==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|か|せん|し|o3=き}}

===Etymology===
From [[河川]] (''kasen'', "rivers") + [[敷]] (''shiki'', "underlay")

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|かせんしき}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かせんしき}}

# [[flood plain]] along a river

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|かせんじき|tr=kasenjiki}}

====Usage notes====
* ''kasenshiki'' is more commonly used than ''kasenjiki''.
